author: barnabasbusa
content:
Good point that <@827653956955406406> just raised. 

Anyone that needs to test devnet 7 spec without bpo:
https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/peerdas-devnet-7
Please use:
```yaml
ethereum_genesis_generator_params:
  image: ethpandaops/ethereum-genesis-generator:4.0.6
```

In your kurtosis config. 

If you are testing latest main branch of ethereum package, it will assume that with fulu you also want to test BPO now. 

https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/fusaka-devnet-0

Kurtosis examples for devnet 7 spec and fusaka-devnet-0 spec can be found in the notes.

author: dmitriishmatko
content:
Maybe leave everything up to the implementation and not put too many implementation-specific recommendations in spec? Something like this:
```
A node SHOULD dynamically adjust its custody groups (without any input from the user) following any changes to the total effective balances of attached validators. The node SHOULD NOT advertise updated `custody_group_count` before `MIN_EPOCHS_FOR_BLOB_SIDECARS_REQUESTS` epochs are available in custody for this group count. 
```
